maintenanceEvent.eventDescription: NUDS-Hoard records generated by Ethan Gruber from spreadsheets Disnarda Pinilla cleaned from the IGCH records.s

noteSet.note: Found with rich treasure of gold and silver jewelry (see Dalton, Oxus). The numbers above are taken from Bellinger's list, but six obvious or probable forgeries are not included. It has been discussed whether the find was heavily contaminated by addition of extraneous material (Dalton and Regling) or actually constitutes one hoard (Schlumberger)

findspot.description: Oxus River (Takhti-Kubad, at junction of modern Vaksh and Piandzh Rivers), Shaartuz raion, Tadzhikistan (anc. Sogdiana)

contents.description: c. 1500 AV, AR, AE: 42 AV and 224 AR coins noted in IGCH in addition to 100 (Ecbatana: only 1 coin noted. Added 99 coins to this group), 22 AE coins and 1 Ni. Added 1458 AV coins to the hoard contents. Then, the total count comes to 1847 coins

refDesc.reference: Dalton, The Treasure of the Oxus (London, 1905; 2nd ed. 1926)
